METHOD.NAME: ListaMensal
METHOD.ACTIONSCRIPT:
SELECT D.DATA ,D.DIA ,D.MES ,D.ANO ,D.NDIASEMANA ,D.NMES ,PC.PCONTA ,PC.CLASSIFICACAO||' - '||PC.DESCRICAO AS DESC_PLANO_CONTA //,L.LANCAMENTO //,L.N_DOCUMENTO //,MIN(L.DESC_GERADOR) AS DESC_GERADOR ,SUM(L.VALOR_INICIAL) AS VALOR_INICIAL ,((SELECT SUM(PVC.VALOR) FROM PREVISOES_CONTABEIS PV INNER JOIN PREVISOES_CONTAS PVC ON PVC.PREVISAO_CONTABIL = PV.PREVISAO_CONTABIL WHERE D.DATA >= PV.DATAI AND D.DATA <= PV.DATAF AND PVC.PCONTA = PC.PCONTA )) AS VALOR_ORCADO ,0 AS VALOR_INICIAL ,0 AS VALOR_PREVISTO ,0 AS VALOR_EFETIVO ,0 AS VALOR_REALIZADO FROM DATAS D LEFT JOIN LANCAMENTOS L ON L.DATA_VENCIMENTO = D.DATA LEFT JOIN PLANO_CONTAS PC ON PC.PCONTA = L.PCONTA WHERE D.DATA BETWEEN :DATAI AND :DATAF [AND L.FILIAL IN #REPLACE ( FILIAIS )] //AND L.EFETUADO = 'T' //AND L.TIPO = 'P'
GROUP BY 1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8
